The Evolution of blood types

The Evolution of blood types (from first to fourth) took place gradually over the centuries as a result of adaptation of digestive and immune system to changing environmental conditions. Thus, the first type of blood is the most “ancient” and initially all the people on Earth were its owners. In those days, they focused solely on hunting, eating meat of dead animals (protein food), so their digestive system was ideally suited for its digestion.

The fourth type appeared relatively recently (about 1500 years ago) as a result of the mixing of the second and third types, and she is very rare and occurs only in 5% of the population.

Based on this classification, Dr. Peter D'Adamo were developed separate recommendations for weight loss and maintenance of health for all four varieties:

Blood type diet of the first (type 0)

Representatives of the first type (33% of the population) are natural carnivores genetically, they have increased the acidity of gastric juice, so that protein foods quickly and fully recycled and not deposited as fat. Therefore, the basis of 0 blood type diet should be lean meat (except pork and goose) – at least 5-6 times a week, fish and seafood. A from the strawberries, oranges, tangerines and strawberries should be abandoned, as these fruits excessively increase the acidity of gastric juice. The same recommendations apply to vegetable and fruit juices, beverages and condiments. Dairy products should be used with caution, because the body is not adapted to their full absorption. Eggs are a valuable source of protein can be eaten 3-4 times a week, but not more than 1 piece per day.

Blood type diet second (type A)

Blood type diet second includes mainly fresh and natural plant products (mainly cereals and vegetables), because the digestive system of people of type A is ideally suited for the use of vegetarian food and very poorly digested and absorbed by meat and dairy products. For example, dairy products, especially whole milk, inhibit the metabolism in the body and causes multiple allergic reactions, and therefore they should be replaced by soy or milk.

Because of the low acidity, characteristic of this type of people, their stomach can not digest meat, so its use contributes to the deposition of fat and a slower metabolism. So if you can not completely eliminate it from the diet, limit consumption of chicken or turkey, but rather go on unsalted fish, such as perch, carp, cod, trout, sardines or mackerel. In addition, because of delicate mucous membrane of the stomach should be excluded from the menu spicy and salty foods, sausages and smoked meat, pepper, vinegar, ketchup, mayonnaise, spices, sour fruits and berries, potatoes.

The source of protein in type A should be soy products, eggs and cheese. Very useful vegetable and fruit juices, such as apricots, cherries, plums, carrots, grapefruit, pineapple and celery. In addition, to prevent the causes of constipation and remove mucus from the intestines is recommended to drink plenty of water (at least two liters a day) and drink every morning on an empty stomach a glass of warm water with the juice of freshly squeezed lemon.

The people of type A is usually a weak immune system open to all infections, sensitive and delicate digestive tract, as well as the increased sensitivity of the nervous system. They often suffer from heart diseases and cancer, as well as tend to pathologies of the gallbladder, liver and symptoms of type 1 diabetes. For them, the recommended diet for a second type of blood is extremely important, because in vegetarian diet immune and digestive system will work more efficiently and be able to prevent the emergence of symptoms of gallstone disease and other serious illnesses.

American diet “Dinner minus”

The American Diet Dinner minus does not promise weight loss in 3 days, but it is very comfortable to compliance and requires meticulous counting calories eaten each piece as a roller coaster. In addition, during the follow-up system, “dinner minus”, the body produces the correct and healthy eating habits – consume a major amount of fat in the first half of the day, when the active hormones are responsible for their split.

It is based on the familiar childhood postulates that at night there are harmful and need to be fed in accordance with the well-known saying “Eat breakfast yourself, share dinner with a friend, a dinner give to the enemy.” That is, the authors offer a methodology completely forget about this concept as dinner and after 17 hours is recommended to drink only ordinary water.

Thus, the basic principles of the diet minus dinner:

  • Copious drinking regime – drink at least 2 liters of water daily;
  • Last meal be carried out not later than 17 hours;
  • Decrease in the consumption of animal fat diet, replacing them with vegetable. Just keep in mind that fats can not be completely ruled out, suitable for all common sense;
  • Choose a menu for only quality products without trans fats, dyes, preservatives, emulsifiers, preferring fast food nutrition healthy homemade food.

Composing your diet, avoid distortions in any direction. If you strongly want something sweet, do not deny yourself – eat a small piece of dessert in the first half of the day. Do not focus only on choosing low-calorie foods, pay more attention to their usefulness and naturalness. Remember, the beauty and harmony can only give a healthy body, provided a balance of everything necessary for the normal functioning – proteins, fats, carbohydrates, vitamins and trace elements.
